mapper.sql: SELECT authorize_transaction.id, authorize_transaction.client_key, authorize_transaction.category, authorize_transaction.sales_id, authorize_transaction.amount, authorize_transaction.deposit, authorize_transaction.ld_commission, authorize_transaction.dealer_commission, authorize_transaction.sales_commission, authorize_transaction.tx_fee, authorize_transaction.card_number, authorize_transaction.expiration_date, authorize_transaction.security_key, authorize_transaction.transaction_id, authorize_transaction.status, authorize_transaction.auth_code, authorize_transaction.type, authorize_transaction.create_time, auth_sales.username sales_name FROM authorize_transaction JOIN auth_sales ON authorize_transaction.sales_id = auth_sales.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO authorize_transaction (sales_id, category, client_key, card_number,expiration_date, security_key, amount, deposit, ld_commission, dealer_commission, sales_commission, tx_fee, transaction_id, status, auth_code, type) VALUES (#{salesId}, #{category}, #{clientKey}, #{cardNumber}, #{expirationDate}, #{securityKey}, #{amount}, #{deposit}, #{ldCommission}, #{dealerCommission}, #{salesCommission}, #{txFee}, #{transactionId}, #{status}, #{authCode}, #{type})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM authorize_transaction WHERE client_key=#{clientKey} AND create_time LIKE concat(#{createTime},'%')

SELECT sales_id, sum(amount) amount, auth_sales.username salesName FROM authorize_transaction, auth_sales WHERE authorize_transaction.sales_id = auth_sales.id GROUP BY sales_id ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT #{_parameter};

SELECT sum(sales_commission) commission, auth_sales.username salesUsername FROM authorize_transaction JOIN auth_sales ON authorize_transaction.sales_id=auth_sales.id WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY salesUsername ORDER BY salesUsername;
